posts.title: Sh*t I Can’t Remember Password Journal
posts.content: With the ever increasing amount of accounts you create online, remembering all your passwords can get a bit tricky. Luckily, with the ‘sh*t I can’t remember” password journal by your side you’ll be able to conveniently write down all your login info so it’s always at hand.

posts.title: Double Beer Mug
posts.content: Double down every round when you fill up using the double beer mug. The ingenious auto-leveling design bonds two plentiful fifteen ounce mugs to one sturdy handle so you can drink twice as much from a single serving.

posts.title: Shocking Potato Party Game
posts.content: If hot potato’s become too dull for you, up the ante of the classic game with this shocking potato party game. Designed in the likeness of a plump Idaho potato, this high tech spud comes with 3 different game modes that will each deliver a tiny shock to the unlucky loser.

posts.title: Collapsible Camping Stove
posts.content: Enjoy a hot meal when you’re out roughing it by bringing along this collapsible camping stove. Crafted from stainless steel and aluminum alloy, this robust little stove assembles in a matter of seconds and can boil 1 liter of water in as little as 2.5 minutes.

posts.title: Over The Sink Cutting Board
posts.content: Straining and rinsing fruits and veggies has never been easier thanks to this over the sink cutting board. This dishwasher safe cutting board comes with non-slip edges and features a built-in collapsible silicone strainer with a 2.5 quart capacity.

posts.title: Remote Control Cockroach
posts.content: Freaking out your house mates is now easier than ever with this remote control cockroach. This high-tech battery operated creepy crawler features life-like movements and is small enough to easily be carried in your pocket when it is not in use.

posts.title: 3D Animal Panties
posts.content: Cover your kitty with a pretty little pussy when you put on one of these 3D animal panties. These cotton and polyester undies provide a comfy fit and are styled to look like adorable little critters – complete with pop-up ears.

posts.title: Fuck Me Perfume
posts.content: Have your date wrapped around your little finger the moment he takes a whiff of your intoxicating fragrance. From the sexually promiscuous playboys that brought you Sure Fuck cologne comes this stimulating aroma designed to make you romantically irresistible.

posts.title: Horizontal Shoe Rack
posts.content: Turn any wall in your home into an impromptu shoe closet with the horizontal shoe rack. The unique, minimalist design of the shoe rack allows you to store shoes horizontally – and most importantly, off the dirty floor.

posts.title: 52 Things To Do While You Poo Book
posts.content: Make your time on the porcelain throne a little more entertaining by going in with the 52 Things To Do While You Poo book. It features a range of enthralling poop related activities and factoids put together by excretion expert Hugh Jassburn for your enjoyment.

posts.title: 3D Cartoon Backpack
posts.content: Give your ensemble a little eye-catching appeal by toting around this unique 3D cartoon backpack. Made from a durable and flexible canvas, the pack provides ample storage space and a fun animated design guaranteed to get you noticed anywhere you go.

posts.title: Molecular Gastronomy Starter Kit
posts.content: Take your culinary skills up a notch by creating 5-star restaurant quality meals using this molecular gastronomy starter kit. The kit comes with everything you’ll need in order to create amazing dishes like chocolate spaghetti, and mint caviar beads.
